shortdesc.i: An array of strings that describes the FileName of the FilePicker when its invoked in Saver mode.

section.p: options.mode should either be FILEPICKER_MODE_SAVER or FILEPICKER_MODE_SAVER_MULTIPLE. Defaults to no file name. In FILEPICKER_MODE_SAVER mode it will only use the first item in this array and display the filename to the user. In FILEPICKER_MODE_SAVER_MULTIPLE it will only allow the user to select a folder and in the onDone call it will return the folder path appending with the fileNames.
